headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Karin Hotring Everon
content:
The only thing this truck hauls is ass. The Karin Hotring Everon is a dynamo of stock car racing, with enough torque to crack asphalt, exhaust pipes that score on the Richter scale, and only one speed…reckless.

This Sports class vehicle is available now from Southern San Andreas Super Autos — but it is only available through March 15.
